product_name: Drunk ElephantVirgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganDrunk Elephant's Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil is like rehab for your skin. Rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9, Marula nourishes and balances while restoring a youthful glow and remains in its purest form.
details: DetailsBenefitsPure, unrefined oil straight from the pip of the marula fruitHighly absorbable oil, sinks in quicklyMoisturizes and nourishes for a healthy-looking glowVisibly diminishes fine lines and wrinklesPowerful antioxidant defense against pollution and damaging environmental free radicalsSuitable for all skin, including the most sensitiveRecyclable packagingFormulated without the Suspicious 6 - the six ingredients Drunk Elephant believes are at the root of almost every skin issue (Essential oils, Silicones, Chemical sunscreens, SLS, Fragrances + dyes, and Drying alcohols)Key IngredientsSclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil: This super-absorbable oil - rich in critical antioxidants such as tocopherol (vitamin E), tocotrienols, phenolic compounds, flavonoids & omegas 6 and 9 fatty acids - moisturizes, nourishes & visibly rejuvenates skin for a youthful-looking glowResearch ResultsIn a consumer-perception study with 101 people after 28 days:93% agreed skin felt hydrated91% agreed skin felt softer90% agreed skin looked renewedItem 2588444How To UseApply two to three drops evenly onto face, neck, chest, hands, back of arms, or any place needing increased moisture.Tip: Use with Drunk Elephant cleansers, serums, and sun protection as part of your complete Drunk Elephant skincare routine.Smoothie Tip: "Here Comes the Sun Smoothie" - 1-2 drops Virgin Marula Oil + 1 pump B-Hydra + 1 pump D-Bronzi, for a healthy, bronzy glow.How to Recycle:Unscrew and remove the dropper and cap, recycle both pieces.Ingredients100% Unrefined Sclerocraya Birrea (Marula) Kernel Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply two to three drops evenly onto face, neck, chest, hands, back of arms, or any place needing increased moisture.Tip: Use with Drunk Elephant cleansers, serums, and sun protection as part of your complete Drunk Elephant skincare routine.Smoothie Tip: "Here Comes the Sun Smoothie" - 1-2 drops Virgin Marula Oil + 1 pump B-Hydra + 1 pump D-Bronzi, for a healthy, bronzy glow.How to Recycle:Unscrew and remove the dropper and cap, recycle both pieces.

reviews.headline: Nice oil but heavy.
reviews.comments:
I love Drunk  Elephant but I am giving this oil a sort of neutral review. 
Pros: moisturizing, leaves a silky/velvety feel on the skin, & does not irritate my sensitive skin.
Cons: Heavy oil, takes a while to absorb.

reviews.headline: Amazing product!
reviews.comments: I bought this to add hydration to my face without retinol. I just completed a cancer cream treatment for precancerous spots and needed a lot of hydration. This product is the best, and I will continue to purchase when I'm out! It is worth the price!

reviews.headline: Drunk Elephant Luxury Face Oil
reviews.comments: Excellent for dry skin!  Not greasy and feels so clean!

reviews.headline: Love this poduct!!
reviews.comments: This is the best facial oil it's so hydrating. I usually use it in skincare smoothies with the lala retro moisturizer and the b hydra serum.

reviews.headline: Very good, but dupes are better
reviews.comments: I love this oil, it helps with my extremely dry skin. The only problem is it's insanely expensive. A very similar product (marula oil) from The Ordinary works the same for $12.

reviews.headline: Definitely buy again
reviews.comments: Excellent for occasional use when needed targeting dry areas on face and neck. I use the oil under or over moisturizer and under any makeup - whether it's just blush, bronzing/highlighter powder or cream, foundation or loose translucent powder. It works and isn't pore clogging or irritating for sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Love this for my dry skin
reviews.comments: I tend to have sensitive and dry skin. When our weather became cold none of my skincare was helping with the dryness. For a couple of weeks I used this morning and night as the 1st to my skincare program. The dry oil immediately began to improve my dryness. Now I use it in the morning only. I will continue to use this probably forever. I love it.

reviews.headline: must avoid clog-prone areas
reviews.comments: it's nice. i use on hands, neck, and eye area but if i use on cheeks i get a clogged pores. found no difference between this and the ordinary version.

reviews.headline: Money well spent
reviews.comments: I am not the type of person to write reviews. So when I tell you me doing this is a big deal, you better keep reading. I had horrible dry patches on my cheeks and nose and very uneven tone. Pregnancy ruined my skin. I went into Ulta looking for something to put under my normal moisturizer and was given this. After about 2 weeks of use, I can't explain it but my skin just looks….different. It's moisturized, smooth, my complexion is better. I'm glowing. I look how I did in my 20s. It's like time was reversed. I'm amazed. Now, will it work like this for everyone? No. But I can say it didn't clog my pores and it's not greasy. It's really an amazing product if you have extremely dry skin. I'll keep buying this regardless of the price.

reviews.headline: Pricey, but good.
reviews.comments: Just a few drops warmed between your hands and then pressed into the skin is needed. Best applied AFTER moisturizer. Important to note most oils are not recommended for acne prone skin, regardless of what a brand may say.

reviews.headline: wanted to love, but a big let down
reviews.comments: I was excited to try this oil based on the reviews. I had high expectations at the price point and was comparing it to my $8 squalane oil that I had been using and loving. So when I got the bottle, saw how small it was in person , that was the first letdown. but I figured, hey, this is probably going to be super awesome and amazing for such a high price and a small amount it's gotta be amazing... buuutttt it wasn't. I didn't like the consistency first off. I felt like I was putting olive oil on my face. I also didn't feel like it was moisturizing. Yes it's oil, but it just sat on my skin. I didn't feel or see it absorb in the same time my regular oil would absorb. I really can't pinpoint what the deal breaker was, it was just everything! the consistency, the amount, the price, the quality.. bottom line: an over-hyped, over priced, social media trend. this isn't the high quality product they want you to think it is. they slap a high price tag and make you think it's worth paying for BECAUSE it's a high cost. but really it's not. There are other clean oils that work better for a FRACTION of the cost (literally $8) that I trust way more and prefer to this DE one. truly think about why you're buying certain products and don't be afraid to return it! buy what works for you, and if you actually like this product and can afford to replace it every 2-3 weeks, good for you... but IMO this is NOT quality, this IS overpriced, and there ARE far better options.

reviews.headline: I would buy this over and over and over again
reviews.comments: Yes, it is an oil but not like you would think.  It goes on smooth and doesn't leave that oil feel on your face. It absorbs within in minutes of putting it on and your face feels wonderful!!!

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: Love this!  Goes on so smooth and absorbed very well.  Will definitely purchase again!

reviews.headline: just another disappointing DE product
reviews.comments: I thought this was going to feel thick and luxurious - especially for the cost. This ended up feeling slippery and cheap, like olive oil on my face. I bought one tiny bottle, and never bought another. There are much better, MUCH cheaper oils out there. I personally love the Good Molecules squalane oil to finish my nightly routine and it costs under $15 and it always absorbs well is a clean product and I can use it all over my face and neck because it's so crazy affordable. After having tried a bunch of the drunk elephant products I've come to the conclusion that it is a very overpriced brand that isn't the best quality.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: It's a keeper!!  My skin does not feel dry but has been visibly dry on some spots. This oil is not heavy and provided the hydration needed. I have been mixing a drip with my moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Don't recommend
reviews.comments: It's packaging is si cute and bright colored so i thought it would be good for my skin!!! Yea no, it made my skin break out. Also i am eleven years old abd this is not necessary for my skin. My mom don't even use that stuff so i wouldn't recommend..

reviews.headline: does not agree
reviews.comments: this product casas major break out and they not the right product for my skin.

reviews.headline: It's good but not great
reviews.comments: I mean it's good in skin care smoothies but by itself is just to oily for me but it does make my skin super soft afterwards.

reviews.headline: Tiny Red Bumps
reviews.comments: I try a lot of products and rarely break out or have negative reactions, but this oil gave me tiny red bumps all over my face. First time I used it, I saw minor bumps but the more I used it, the bumps increased. The sample size came with another D.E. product so luckily it was just a free sample.

reviews.headline: The best facial oil
reviews.comments: I love this product! My skin is softer and feels amazing! Worth every cent!

properties.name: Best Uses

values.label: Best used at night for hydration and anti-aging

display_values: Best used at night for hydration and anti-aging

media.headline: Makes u glow, hydrateing , cute boxing
Makes u glow, hydrateing , cute boxing
Good, but not for Acne-Prone Skin

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this facial oil. It is the best one I have ever tried! I collected samples of the product, then purchased the smaller bottle, used it til the bottle ran dry, and now I have the large bottle. I can't say enough about it! I use it to make "smoothies" with other drunk elephant products & I do think it does its job as a carrier oil. A couple drops of this with Lala Retro, and 1 pump of B-hydra… It leaves my skin feeling so hydrated and glowy!
faceoff_positive.headline: MUST BUY!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: This product was not for me. I have acne-prone skin, so this product was a little too heavy to put on my face. I think with a different skin type, this product would be perfect!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Good, but not for Acne-Prone Skin
